afx-core
  • All Classes
 

All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Annotation Types Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAFXApplication
    Base class for ActionFX applications that can be optionally used.
    AbstractInstantiationSupplier<T>
    Base class for specialized Supplier implementation that take care of the instantiation of an ActionFX component (controller, view, etc.).
    AbstractView
    Abstract base class for view implementations.
    ActionFX
    Central handler for working with ActionFX.
    ActionFX.ActionFXBuilder
    Builder for setting up the singleton instance of ActionFX.
    ActionFX.ActionFXState
    Enumeration describing the state of ActionFX.
    ActionFXByteBuddyEnhancer
    Byte-code enhancer using the ByteBuddy framework.
    ActionFXByteBuddyEnhancer.AFXActionMethodInterceptorDelegator
    Interceptor implementation for handling method invocation of methods annotated with the AFXShowView annotation.
    ActionFXEnhancer
    Interface for byte code enhancer.
    ActionFXEnhancer.EnhancementStrategy
    Defines available enhancement strategies for ActionFX.
    AFXActionMethodInterceptor
    Interceptor implementation for handling method invocation of methods annotated with the AFXShowView annotation.
    AFXApplication
    Annotation that can be applied to the main class of an ActionFX application.
    AFXController
    Annotation for ActionFX controllers to associate and manage a view togehter with it.
    AFXNestedView
    Annotation to define a nested view.
    AFXOnEvent
    Annotation to be applied at method level that let's ActionFX wire the annotated method to the specified event.
    AFXShowView
    Annotation to be applied at method level that allows to define which view to be displayed after successful method invocation.
    AFXUtils
    Util-class for working with JavaFX.
    AnnotationUtils
    Utils class for working with annotations.
    BeanContainerFacade
    Facade for accessing a bean container holding necessary view and controller instances.
    BorderPanePosition
    Describes the position in a BorderPane.
    ClassPathScanningUtils
    Utils for scanning the classpath.
    ConstructorBasedInstantiationSupplier<T>
    Instantiation supplier that uses defined constructors of given class.
    ControllerInstantiationSupplier<T>
    Instantiation supplier for controller instances.
    ControllerWrapper<T>
    Wrapper class around a JavaFX controller that is enhanced either with an instrumentation agent or via sub-classing.
    DefaultBeanContainer
    Default implementation of a bean container using an underlying hash map as bean cache.
    FxmlView
    View implementation that uses FXML for describing the view.
    NodeVisitor
    Functional handler for applying some logic during scene graph traversal.
    NodeWrapper
    Wrapper around a Node (or other objects inside a scene graph, e.g.
    NodeWrapper.AnchorPaneAttacher
    Attacher that positions a node inside an AnchorPane.
    NodeWrapper.BorderPaneAttacher
    Attacher that positions a node in a BorderPane.
    NodeWrapper.ColRowAttacher
    Specialized attacher for GridPane nodes, where the node can be attached at a specified column and row.
    NodeWrapper.DefaultAttacher
    Simple attacher that supports single child wrapper like ScrollPane (and its content property) as well as node derived from Parent.
    NodeWrapper.ListAttacher
    Attaches a node to a list at a specified position.
    NodeWrapper.ListFirstAttacher
    Attaches a node as first element to a list.
    NodeWrapper.ListLastAttacher
    Attaches a node as last element to a list.
    NodeWrapper.NodeAttacher
    Interface for attaching a node to the node wrapper's children at a specified position.
    ReflectionUtils
    Utils for handling reflections.
    View
    Interface for JavaFX views.
    ViewBuilder<T extends AbstractView>
    Builder for setting up instances derived from AbstractView.
